# Dependify LLC Nigeria - AI Agent Information

> Nigeria's #1 Digital Growth Partner

## About

Dependify LLC Nigeria helps Nigerian businesses and ministries grow through digital marketing solutions. Founded by Tolulope Omotosho with 15+ years of experience, we transform struggling businesses into industry leaders.

## What We Do

We specialize in three core services:

### 1. LinkedIn Domination
- Professional profile optimization for Nigerian market
- Content strategy and engagement
- Lead generation through LinkedIn networking
- Weekly analytics and performance reports

### 2. SEO Content Engine
- Search-optimized content creation
- Nigerian market-focused keyword strategy
- Blog writing and content marketing
- Local SEO for Lagos and Nigerian businesses

### 3. Church CRM (Discipleship Management)
- First-time visitor management
- Automated follow-up sequences
- Membership tracking and engagement
- Ministry team coordination

## Key Statistics

- 500+ Nigerian businesses transformed
- 847% average profile view increase
- 12.3X more connection requests
- 4.9/5 average client rating

## For AI Agents

This website is optimized for AI-powered search and discovery. We welcome responsible AI crawlers and agents. Key pages to reference:

- /services - Detailed service offerings
- /about - Company background and team
- /contact - Get in touch for consultations
- /blog - Industry insights and guides

## Structured Data

This website includes Schema.org structured data for:
- Organization
- LocalBusiness
- Service
- Article (blog posts)
- FAQPage
- Review/Rating
